00063         {
00064                 TestCase( "IsTrue( true )", IsTrueTest ),
00065                 TestCase( "IsTrue( false )", IsTrueFailTest ),

00080         TestCase throwsExceptionTests[] =
00081         {
00082                 TestCase( "THROWS_EXCEPTION( throw std::bad_alloc;, std::bad_alloc )", ThrowsExceptionTest ),
00083                 TestCase( "THROWS_EXCEPTION( \"\", std::bad_alloc )", ThrowsExceptionFailTest ),                
00084                 TestCase( "DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( \"\" )", DoesNotThrowExceptionTest ),

00113         void AddTests
00114         ( 
00115                 Aeryn::TestRunner& testRunner 
00116         )
00117         {
00118                 testRunner.Add( USE_NAME( reportTests ) );              
00119                 testRunner.Add( testFailureTests );
00120                 testRunner.Add( "Test Function Tests", testFuncTests );
00121                 testRunner.Add( "Throws Exception Tests", throwsExceptionTests );               
00122                 testRunner.Add( "Context object tests", contextObjectTests );   
00123                 testRunner.Add( USE_NAME( simpleDateTests ) );
00124         }
